text: Hugh David Politzer (; born August 31, 1949) is an American theoretical physicist. He is the Richard Chace Tolman Professor of Theoretical Physics at the California Institute of Technology. He shared the 2004 Nobel Prize in Physics with David Gross and Frank Wilczek for their discovery of asymptotic freedom in quantum chromodynamics. He was born in New York City. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:American physicists Category:Scientists from New York City
title: Hugh David Politzer
